params.user: The address of the referred user

returns.totalReferralBps: The total referral bps that the calling contract should deduct from the protocol fee

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.amount: The amount to calculate the fee on

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.directRefFeeBps_: The direct referral fee in basis points

params.indirectRefFeeBps_: The indirect referral fee in basis points

params.user: The address of the referred user

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimReferralReward(address).notice: Claims the referral reward for a given base token for the msg.sender

constructor.notice: Fee bps is the % of the protocol fee that the referrer will receive

directRefFeeBps().notice: The direct referral fee in basis points

getReferralBpsFor(address).notice: Callable by the vault with the address of the referred user

getReferralRewardFor(address,address).notice: Gets the referral reward for a user

indirectRefFeeBps().notice: The indirect referral fee in basis points

payoutThreshold(address).notice: The payout threshold for a token

quoteReferralFee(address,uint256).notice: Calculates the referral fee for a user

receiveReferral(address,address,uint256).notice: Callable by the vault with the address of the referred user

referredBy(address).notice: Mapping for referred users and respective referrers

setPayoutThreshold(address[],uint256[]).notice: Sets the payout threshold for a token

setReferral(address,address).notice: Callable by the vault to set the referral for a user

whitelistedVault(address).notice: Whether a given vault is whitelisted
